tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audience_segmentation (
  segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  segment_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  demographics JSON,
  interests JSON,
  buying_behavior JSON
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
    audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE audience_interests (
    audience_id INT,
    interest_category VARCHAR(50),
    interest_level INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (audience_id) REFERENCES audience_demographics(audience_id)
)

CREATE TABLE audience_behavior (
    audience_id INT,
    purchase_history TEXT,
    last_purchase_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (audience_id) REFERENCES audience_demographics(audience_id)
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE interests (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interest_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE buying_behavior (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_history JSON
)

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    target_audience TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_targeting (
    campaign_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    target_date DATE,
    campaign_score DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES demographics(user_id)
);
